                        iFP-ç‰ˆå›¾è§„åˆ’

                        iEDAå¤§çº¦ 6 åˆ†é’Ÿ

                        # FP_TCLå‘½ä»¤ä½¿ç”¨æ‰‹å†Œ

                        Dependencies

                        • sudo apt-get install libunwind-dev
                        • sudo apt-get install libspdlog-dev(env : ubuntu20.04)
                        • sudo apt-get install boost 1.71
                        • sudo apt-get install eigen

                        Build

                        git clone --recursive
                        cd iEDA
                        mkdir build
                        cd build
                        cmake ..
                        make

                        Run

                        cd iEDA/bin

                        ./FP gtest.tcl

                        å·¥å…·æ›´æ–°

                        cd iEDA

                        git pull

                        rm -rf build

                        mkdir build

                        cd build

                        cmake ..

                        make

                        #1.init_floorplan

                        • -core_site coreçš„siteé€‰å–
                        • -io_site é’ˆå¯¹110å·¥è‰ºï¼Œæ­¤å¤„ä¸ºå¯é€‰å‚æ•°ï¼Œä¼šé»˜è®¤é€‰æ‹©â€œIOSiteâ€

                        ##ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

                        set DIE_AREA "0.0 0.0 2843 2843"

                        set CORE_AREA "150 150 2693 2693"

                        set PLACE_SITE HD_CoreSite

                        set IO_SITE IOSite

                        init_floorplan \

                        â€‹ -die_area $DIE_AREA \

                        â€‹ -core_area $CORE_AREA \

                        â€‹ -core_site $PLACE_SITE \

                        â€‹ -io_site $IO_SITE

                        • -point_list ç”Ÿæˆstripeçš„è¿æ¥ç‚¹ï¼Œå½“è¿æ¥ç‚¹ä¸ªæ•°å¤§äº2æ—¶ï¼Œå‰åä¸¤ä¸ªè¿æ¥ç‚¹ä¸¤ä¸¤ç”Ÿæˆstripeï¼Œ
